_WARNING_HEADER_ARIA_HIDDEN_{{text}}_: Heading is hidden for screen reader with aria-hidden: {{ text }}
_HEADINGS_LINKS_BITV_ILIA_: HTML structural elements for headings (check step 9.1.3.1a)
_HEADINGS_LINKS_HOW_TO_STRUCTURE_HEADING: How to structure headings for web accessibility
_HEADINGS_LINKS_DOCUMENT_HAS_HEADING_FOR: Document has heading for non-repeated content
_HEADINGS_LINKS_FAILURE_1_3_1_MARKUP_OR_: Failure of Success Criterion 1.3.1 due to using changes in text presentation to convey information without using the appropriate markup or text
_HEADINGS_LINKS_FAILURE_1_3_1_USING_STRU: Failure of Success Criterion 1.3.1 due to using structural markup in a way that does not represent relationships in the content
_HEADING_NOT_WARNINGS_: No issues detected, but this does not guarantee the absence of errors. It is recommended to manually check the correctness of the headings usage.
